arts.ttl: Journalist confirms Premier League star is “firmly on the radar” of Leeds United
arts.sum: Leeds United goalkeeper Illan Meslier has been linked with a move away from the club at the end of the season. Journalist Graeme Bailey has now revealed to Leeds United News that Aaron Ramsdale is a player of interest for the Championship outfit. “The goalkeeper situation will be fascinating. Ramsdale, Trafford, Kelleher, there are some […] The post Journalist confirms Premier League star is “firmly on the radar” of Leeds United appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Championship: West Brom halt Leeds run and Weimann saves Blackburn
arts.sum: Furlong equaliser frustrates leaders at home Two late goals provide drama at Ewood Park Leeds’ Championship title charge was checked as they were held to a frustrating 1-1 draw at Elland Road by West Brom. Junior Firpo headed the home side into an early lead but Darnell Furlong equalised with a looping header before the break. Leeds were denied a sixth straight win but extended their unbeaten league run to 17 matches. West Brom’s winless league run on the road extended to 10 games. Leeds are now eight points clear of Burnley, who sit third and lost at Preston in the FA Cup, while second-placed Sheffield United play at QPR in a 3pm kick-off. This story will be updated Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Leeds 1-1 WBA: Mowbray comments on promotion race
arts.sum: Leeds United were held to a 1-1 home draw against West Brom this afternoon, a relatively balanced affair with few big chances either way. Junior Firpo’s early flicked header from a Dan James cross looked to have set Leeds on their way to another crucial win in the promotion race, glancing in a brilliant cross as Joe Wildsmith flapped in goal.

arts.ttl: Leeds United next five fixtures compared to Championship promotion rivals after West Brom draw
arts.sum: The point moves the Whites six points above second-placed Sheffield United ahead of their clash against QPR. Leeds United’s winning streak has come to an end, but they still got a point from their Championship clash against West Bromwich Albion in Saturday’s early kick-off.

arts.ttl: West Brom frustrate Championship leaders Leeds
arts.sum: Leeds' Sky Bet Championship title charge was checked as they were held to a frustrating 1-1 draw at Elland Road against battling play-off chasers West Brom.

arts.ttl: Late chances but no late show this time! | Leeds 1-1 West Brom
arts.sum: Highlights of the Sky Bet Championship match between Leeds United and West Bromwich Albion.

arts.ttl: Leeds United player ratings vs West Brom as Joe Rodon and Mateo Joseph catch eye
arts.sum: West Brom proved to be a threat throughout the game and got their equaliser before half-time. The game got off swimmingly when Junior Firpo headed home inside the first 10 minutes from a Daniel James cross .

arts.ttl: Leeds’ promotion run given a reality check by battling West Brom
arts.sum: The two sides drew at Elland Road.

arts.ttl: Leeds: Ampadu blow opens door for Wöber in April
arts.sum: Leeds United are likely to be without Ethan Ampadu for the remainder of the season after knee ligament surgery was confirmed for the captain, but Max Wöber might be looking to fill the void in a month’s time when he’s back to fitness. A knee injury was confirmed by Farke, then post-match revealed to be one that required surgery after ligament damage:

arts.ttl: Leeds: 18-y/o talent Rory Mahady making progress
arts.sum: Leeds United’s win over Sheffield United on Monday was all about the first team’s push for promotion, but it will have been a great experience for U21 ‘keeper Rory Mahady, travelling in a matchday squad for the first time. Rory Mahady travels with Leeds senior squad for first time
